entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as someone who would not send Harry anything dangerous on purpose, but has a different view of what is dangerous.

entities.name: parcels
entities.description: The parcel is described as giving a strange quiver and snapping loudly, like it had jaws.

entities.name: spiders
entities.description: Giant spiders are mentioned as being befriended by Hagrid.

entities.name: dogs
entities.description: Vicious, three-headed dogs are mentioned as being bought by Hagrid from men in pubs.

entities.name: dragon eggs
entities.description: Illegal dragon eggs are mentioned as being sneaked into Hagrid's cabin.

entities.name: book
entities.description: The book is described as having a handsome green cover and flipping onto its edge to scuttle sideways like a crab.

entities.name: lamp
entities.description: Harry uses the lamp on his bedside table to prepare for an attack.

relationships.description: Hagrid is mentioned as sending Harry a parcel.
